body.p: Some informations are get from agent dynamicaly and can't be modified :

ul.li: device_id : it's the ID of the agent generated on first running time.
Token : it's the key used to wake agent remotly. It is generated each time of agent begin to run.
Version : it's the version of agent core. This version is only get when agent send its inventory to plugin.
Last scan : it's the last time agent have contacted plugin.
